Message.Msg: Everyone gets a tax increase and they can blame it on someone else. Don't fool yourself Obama can care less about the middle class. He wants their votes and money so he can spend it on making himself look like the "good guy". If he really cared he would have been in Washington hashing it out. Message.Title: Over 65,000 have signed Piers Morgan deportation petition
Message.Msg: British guest worker Piers Morgan has been agitating and propagandizing against our constitution. He is here in the USA to make the kind of salary he couldn't make in UK. I don't think the guest should tell the host how to run their own house. Piers, if your Queens family had their way we would be eating crumpets and have no bill of rights. What if we went to UK and told you to get rid of the Royals? This is what the petition on the White House petition website says WE PETITION THE OBAMA ADMINISTRATION TO: Deport British Citizen Piers Morgan for Attacking 2nd Amendment British Citizen and CNN television host Piers Morgan is engaged in a hostile attack against the U.S. Constitution by targeting the Second Amendment. We demand that Mr. Morgan be deported immediately for his effort to undermine the Bill of Rights and for exploiting his position as a national network television host to stage attacks against the rights of American citizens Go to that website and sign this petition. Its not a freedom of speech issue, its our rights and Gen. Washington fought Piers forefathers for the right to give us our rights and freedom. We dishonor our forefathers if we let this Brit tell us we don't deserve our constitution.

Topic.Title: Dems win if we go over cliff

Message.Msg: Dems have gone 4 years without passing any of the budgets sent to them by the House of Representatives, or proposing a budget of their own and having a conference committee of both houses iron out a bill. Reid leading the Dems has never brought up any GOP budget for a vote. This allowed Obama to spend 6 billion more than the feds took in. Its a spending crisis of the Dems making. Especially since Obama continued Bushes wars and tax cuts when he had all three branches under dem control. If the Republicans get blamed its Media Bias and Gop ineptitude at knowing how to get the truth out.
